::Feline::

She wrapped her arms around him and kissed him.  She then smiled and 
looked at him,"You know, it's awefully bright in here."  She broke 
off from him for a moment.  She went over to the wall and turned off 
the lights in the room. SHe then went back to HotRod and kissed him 
again and again.  She purred while kissing him.


Fade to black.

A few hours later, she walked out of his room and walked to her lab, 
whistling a lively tune.
